name: Cassini
description:
Recomendation for Browser: Play on Fullscreen for correct Button Scalling

Cassini is a Jump ’n’ Run Game, where you have to maneuver the eponymous robot Cassini to the End of the Level.

But to reach those Exit of the Level, you will need a lot of Skill, Luck, Timing thats absolutely on point and a very high frustration resistance.

The game is also downloadable and available for mobile Device...
